con:configuration.scriptText:
import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def stateroomType = parse.stateroomCategoryTypes.stateroomType log.info stateroomType assert stateroomType!=null
def stateroomDesc = parse.stateroomCategoryTypes.stateroomDescription[0].toUpperCase() log.info stateroomDesc assert stateroomDesc!=null
def stateroom = 'BALCONY'
assert stateroomDesc == stateroom log.info ('StaeroomType is matched ' +stateroomDesc +stateroom )
def stateroomCategory = parse.stateroomCategoryTypes.categories.stateroomCategoryCode log.info stateroomCategory

def stateroom = 'INTERIOR'
assert stateroomDesc == stateroom log.info ('StaeroomType is matched ' +stateroomDesc +stateroom )
def stateroomCategory = parse.stateroomCategoryTypes.categories.stateroomCategoryCode log.info stateroomCategory

con:config.con:query: Select Top 10 SH.shopper_id, SH.brand_code, SH.loyalty_nbr, SH.shopper_title_text, SH.shopper_last_name, SH.shopper_first_name, SH.gender_code, SH.birth_date, AD.country_code, ADT.address_type_desc From SHOPPER_LOGIN SL Inner Join SHOPPER SH On SL.shopper_id = SH.shopper_id Inner Join ADDRESS AD On AD.shopper_id = SH.shopper_id Inner Join ADDRESS_TYPE ADT On AD.address_type_id = ADT.address_type_id Where SH.brand_code = 'R' And SH.loyalty_nbr Is Not Null
